abstract: Conan O’Brien was a guest Thursday night on David Letterman’s show, giving each a chance to speak about their rival, Jay Leno.
snippet: Conan O’Brien was a guest Thursday night on David Letterman’s show, giving each a chance to speak about their rival, Jay Leno.
lead_paragraph: 8:51 p.m. | Updated So what would David Letterman and Conan O’Brien talk about when the two late-night hosts got together for a chat Thursday night? The Indy 500?

headline.main: When Conan Visits Dave, the Topic Inevitably Is Jay
